casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

94-537. Dayton Bar Assn. v. Marzocco.

IT IS ORDERED by this court, sua sponte, that Ralph L. Marzocco, Attorney Registration No. 0020072, last known business address in Dayton, Ohio, is found in contempt for failure to comply with this court’s order of December 23,1994, to wit, failure to pay board costs in the amount of $3,207.72 on or before March 23, 1995, and failure to pay publication costs in the amount of $147.66 on or before June 14, 1995.
